directions: Stir water, tomatoes, beef broth, and Italian seasoning together in a large pot; bring to a boil. Add meatballs, Italian-blend vegetables, and pasta to the pot. Return broth to a boil, reduce heat to medium-low, and cook until the meatballs are heated through and the pasta is tender, about 10 minutes. Ladle soup into bowls and garnish with Parmesan cheese.
ingredients: 2 (14 ounce) cans diced tomatoes with onion and garlic, undrained
1 (16 ounce) package frozen cooked Italian-style meatballs
title: Hearty Italian Meatball Soup
